title: How do I fix my unbelievably high battery drainage issues on my Pixel 4a 5G???
content: For the past 2 months I've had the worst battery drainage issues and nothing has helped. I tried a factory reset, turning off 5G (and my phone is also having trouble with 5G and I'm currently limited to 3G because even LTE doesn't work on my phone), and now I'm having t-mobile send me a refurbished 4a 5G but every article I see talks about the pixel 5 but I've been having this serious issue on my 4a 5G. I can't even go on a bike ride longer than an hour for fear of it dying and me being lost...
